item.description:
Augusts meeting will give us a recap of the 2010 Airventure. Updates on our two upcoming big events, Wings and Wheels and our fall Young Eagles flights.

Speaker Airline Captain Mark Cantrell will talk about his professional flying experiences anda take questions... Thanks to Gary Archer for setting this one up....

Have you attended any of the fly outs? Are your hours down or up as a result? If they are down, you're missing out on the fun. We've been to some great places, Fishers Island, Long Island, BAF and more to come still... We'll get to Marshfield and Laconia :-)


As always, Fly Often and Fly Safe.
See you all soon.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

As always, food at 6:00 and meeting at 7:00.

Where else can you have this much excitement for $25 bucks a year?

Fly Often and Fly Safe,
Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association EAA Chapter 1454 Monthly Meetup
